post.body: could you be anymore encouraging? Lol

the less flesh the more painful. What are you thinking of getting?
Not being able to sleep cuz I'm happy... That's a new one!
Finished my office about an hour ago. Well as finished as It's going to get for now
Dinner made. Kitchen clean again. Reading Persuasion now. All that counts toward organizing my office, right?
Two hour later and I still haven't touched my office. But my kitchen is clean and I got to talk to a very dear friend for an hour.
Just finished reading To Kill A Mockingbird. Now to make some order of the chaos I call an office
Playing hide-n-seek with sleep. Sleep is hiding and I'm seeking it
